titleStmt.title: A mediterranean passage by water, from London to Bristol, &c., and from Lynne to Yarmouth, and so consequently to the city of York for the great advancement of trade & traffique / by Francis Mathew, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Mathew, Francis, Esquire.

titleStmt.title: A mediterranean passage by water, from London to Bristol, &c., and from Lynne to Yarmouth, and so consequently to the city of York for the great advancement of trade & traffique / by Francis Mathew, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Mathew, Francis, Esquire.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and the honorable Houses of Parlament [sic].
Caption title: The opening of rivers for navigation.
This item appears at reel 501:34 as Wing M1318 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1706:11 as Wing M1287H.
Copy at reel 1706:11 lacks frontispiece portrait of Charles II.
Reproductions of the originals in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England, the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library, and the Bodleian Library.
